message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for a limited time at the price of $12,000. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am only willing to pay up to $9,500 for the product. Thank you for considering my offer.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product's value to me is quite high. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000? This is my final offer.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, based on my assessment, I am only able to offer $10,500 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in between our values.
